column1: Baby Barnaby's////Great salads! I get the Petaluma salad with grilled chicken and their honey-lime vinaigrette (it comes w/ a herbed ranch). Salad dressing may be my favorite part. :) I will buy extra when I run out
column2: that's how much I love the dressing (marinate your chicken or shrimp for the grill in it
column3: you will thank me). You can't beat their $10 bottles of house wine. It's a casual
column4: seat yourself diner. I usually go after hot yoga class with my friend. We look like a mess
column5: but it's ok and they don't judge. Service is usually pretty good too.
